Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Technische Studien, S. 146

1868–1871 · LW A242 · R. 7

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 1'

  • 62. Sprünge mit der Tremolo-Begleitung

This is a collection of technical exercises: short, repeated passages that cycle through the keys. There is a single exception, the sixty-second study, that is of some musical interest too.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 1 · Z. A/B 12266 · ed. Imre Mező [nos. 1–30]
  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 2 · Z. A/B 12267 · ed. Imre Mező [nos. 31–56 and 57b]
  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 3 · Z. A/B 12268 · ed. Imre Mező [nos. 57a and 58–68]

62. Sprünge mit der Tremolo-Begleitung

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 3
